wikipedia_page.main: Mark Adrian Blenkarne (born 1957), is a male retired archer who competed for Great Britain and England.

link_mentions.page: Great Britain at the 1980 Summer Olympics
response: In the third appearance by Great Britain in modern Olympic archery, two men and two women represented the country.  Mark Blenkarne missed winning a medal in the men's competition by only three points, by far the most successful result for Great Britain since archery was returned to the Olympic schedule.

link_mentions.page: Archery at the 1980 Summer Olympics – Men's individual
